items.name: Meowcha Matcha
items.description: Delicious oat milk matcha over ice, served with vanilla sweet cream cold foam.

items.name: Catnip Cooler
items.description: Refreshing iced tea infused with mint and a hint of lemon.

items.name: Tuxedo Tea Latte
items.description: Start with chai concentrate and milk, froth in heavy cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

items.name: Pawfee Delight
items.description: Three shots of espresso with your choice of milk, sweetened with white chocolate syrup and topped with marshmallows.

items.name: Kitty Krispy
items.description: Homemade rice crispy treat with frosted whisker design

items.name: Tabby Cat Scones
items.description: Your choice of scone, including lemon poppy seed, blueberry, and pumpkin.

cats.name: Ry
cats.description: Ry is a majestic cat with a coat that shimmers like silk. This regal feline combines elegance with a playful spirit, making him the perfect companion for those who appreciate a touch of royalty and a dash of mischievous charm. If you're ready to invite a majestic mischief maker into your home, Ry is waiting to reign over your heart.

cats.name: Scarlett
cats.description: Scarlett is a vibrant cat with an adventurous spirit. Always ready for playtime, this energetic gal loves chasing feather toys and exploring every nook and cranny. If you're looking for a lively companion who will keep you entertained, Scarlett is the perfect match.

cats.name: Mini
cats.description: Mini is a shy friend with a big heart. She's a true cuddle enthusiast, always ready to provide warmth and comfort. If you're in search of a quiet furry friend who excels in the art of snuggling, look no further than Mini

cats.name: David
cats.description: David is a cat on a mission to spread joy with his playful antics and rhythmic purring. With a mischievous glint in his eye, David is always up for a game or a cuddle session. If you're looking for a bundle of playful energy, David is the purrfect choice.

cats.name: Hedwig
cats.description: Meet Hedwig, a cat with a mysterious allure and poise. This enigmatic charmer loves to find cozy spots for solitude, making him an ideal companion for quiet evenings and thoughtful moments

cats.name: Milo
cats.description: Milo is a fearless explorer with a rugged charm that sets him apart. This adventurous cat loves climbing, discovering hidden corners, and keeping a watchful eye on his surroundings. If you're seeking a companion for your own exciting journey, Milo is ready to be your steadfast sidekick
